items.abstract: A user and environmentally friendly synthesis of the widely used N-heterocyclic carbene (NHC) precursors was realized using mechanochemistry.
title: A more sustainable and efficient access to IMes·HCl and IPr·HCl by ball-milling

reference.author: Métro

items.abstract: A user-friendly and general mechanochemical method was developed to access rarely described NHC (N-heterocyclic carbene) silver(i) complexes featuring N,N-diarylimidazol(idin)ene ligands and non-coordinating tetrafluoroborate or hexafluorophosphate counter anions.
title: Unraveling the synthesis of homoleptic [Ag(N,N-diaryl-NHC)2]Y (Y = BF4, PF6) complexes by ball-milling
